tool_description: Matches customer issues with agents who have the appropriate skills and experience level within a target department.

issue_category.description: Category of the customer issue requiring resolution

target_department.description: Department where agent matching should occur

previous_agent_id.description: ID of previous agent who handled this customer (to avoid if possible)

error_messages: Invalid issue_complexity: Must be one of [simple, moderate, complex, expert]. Check complexity classification.
Department not found: The specified target_department does not exist or is not available.
No qualified agents: No agents in the target department have the required skills for this issue type.
Invalid customer_tier: Must be one of [basic, premium, enterprise]. Verify customer tier.
usage: Provide issue details and target department to find the best-matched available agents based on skills, experience, and customer tier requirements.

qualified_agents.description: List of agent IDs qualified to handle this issue

agent_scores.description: Skill match scores for each qualified agent (0-1)

recommended_agent.description: Top recommended agent ID for this transfer

agent_specialties.description: Primary specialties of each qualified agent

availability_status.description: Current availability status of each qualified agent
